info.title: POP API
info.description: Precision Oncology Platform API for exchange of research cancer data

get.summary: Get All Users Matching The Query
Get All Patient Cases Matching The Query
Get All Neoplastic Entities Matching The Query
Get All Stagings Matching The Query

Get All Tumor Markers Matching The Query
Get Tumor Marker Analyte Details By Code

username.description: Required. 150 characters or fewer. Letters, digits and @/./+/-/_ only.
username.title: Username

dateOfBirth.description: Anonymized date of birth (year/month). The day is set to the first day of the month by convention.
dateOfBirth.title: Date of birth

dateOfDeath.description: Anonymized date of death (year/month). The day is set to the first day of the month by convention.
dateOfDeath.title: Date of death

causeOfDeath.description: Classification of the cause of death.
causeOfDeath.title: Cause of death

age.description: Approximate age of the patient in years
age.title: Age

createdById.title: Created By

caseId.description: Indicates the case of the patient who's neoplasm(s) are recorded
caseId.title: Patient case

relationship.description: Relationship linking secondary and recurrent tumors to their primary origin or for distinguishing between different phases of the disease.
relationship.title: Neoplastic relationship

relatedPrimaryId.description: Reference to the primary neoplasm of which the neoplasm(s) originated from.
relatedPrimaryId.title: Related primary neoplasm

assertionDate.description: The date on which the existence of the neoplasm(s) was first asserted or acknowledged
assertionDate.title: Assertion date

morphology.description: Describes the cell type of the tumor and its biologic activity, in other words, the characteristics of the tumor itself
morphology.title: Morphology

differentitation.description: Morphologic differentitation characteristics of the neoplasm(s)
differentitation.title: Differentiation

laterality.description: Laterality qualifier for the location of the neoplasm(s)
laterality.title: Laterality

description.title: Description
